name: BART WARS
description:
I produced this customised version of the classic Atari arcade game for my Star Wars obsessed brother's 50th birthday during the initial UK lockdown in April 2020.

It was an extension of  the first GameMaker Studio tutorial I completed, adding customised graphics and sound, increasing difficulty and 5 different levels.

Just a bit of silly fun to help make up for the fact his big birthday celebrations had to be cancelled.
